headline: Here’s Why Diamond Hill Mid Cap Composite Purchased Revvity (RVTY) in Q3
summary: Diamond Hill Capital, an investment management company, released its “Mid Cap Strategy” third-quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. Markets continued their rally in the third quarter, with US stocks gaining over 8% as measured by the Russell 3000 Index. Small-cap stocks experienced the strongest quarterly performance, rising by […]
